titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Oversight and Accountability in the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Oversight and Accountability in the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability for the 118th Congress.
